resources.string: Johann Sebastian Bach is not an organist.
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart is not a violinist.
Ludwig van Beethoven is not born in Bonn, Germany.
Felix Mendelssohn was not born into a prominent Jewish family.
Johannes Brahms venerated Bach and Beethoven.
Richard Wagner revolutionised opera through his concept of the Gesamtkunstwerk.
Alban Berg is not the composer of Wozzeck.
Ernst Krenek is an Austrian composer of Czech origin.
